# SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.autoReverse

**Case**

After the animation displays all of its images, it plays again in reverse order.

## Declaration

```swift
case autoReverse
```

## Constants

- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.repeat**: The animation loops after displaying all of its images.
- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.clamp**: The animation stops after displaying all of its images.
